alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 9:32PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Campbell County through 1000 PM MDT... At 932 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles north of Recluse, or 35 miles southwest of Broadus, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Campbell County north of Recluse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
